rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0001
rows.name: Shin there you are! Where've you been?

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0002
rows.name:
The capital's outskirts. I wanted to
pick some ingredients.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0003
rows.name:
Oh, you are joking. This is the capital
we're in!

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0004
rows.name:
It's packed to bursting with high-class
nosh around here! Why're you still
going around foraging in the dirt?

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0005
rows.name:
On the other hand, Shin's cooking
really is unparalleled, and there is a
certain appeal in making food yourself

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0006
rows.name: Yeah, OK, that's...

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0007
rows.name: ...That's spot-on, actually...

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0009
rows.name: So... I spoke briefly with Seiryu.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0010
rows.name: Oh, really? What did he say?

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0011
rows.name:
...It was a difficult subject for me to
wrap my head around.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0012
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Think ]...

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0013
rows.name:
[ML:Feeling kind=Think ]New relationships...? No.
I'm more than happy with
what I have right now...

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0014
rows.name: All right, time to draw up some plans.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0015
rows.name:
To get the seal back, we'll have to
make our way to the Iiran core.
Question is, what then?

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0016
rows.name:
Metsu implied that we still have some
time. Hikari-san seems to believe we can
take him at his word.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0017
rows.name: You can, yeah.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0018
rows.name:
He's enjoying this, is he?
Damn him...

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0019
rows.name:
I know how you feel, Adel, but
perhaps we should be thankful. His own
hubris has allowed us this chance.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0020
rows.name:
We'll use the time we've got to
prepare for the battle ahead.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0021
rows.name:
Right. We need to be stronger still,
or we'll never make it through this.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0022
rows.name:
The citizens are in fear of what may
befall them.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0023
rows.name:
I believe you are best equipped to
give them the strength they need,
Laura

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0024
rows.name: What, me?!

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0025
rows.name:
Yes. You are properly a Iiran
knight now.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0026
rows.name:
A knight is not called upon solely for
their skill in combat. It is also their duty
to instill courage, and hope.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0027
rows.name:
You must hold your head high, and
serve the needs of your nation.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0028
rows.name: The needs of my nation...

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0029
rows.name:
Feels like the whole world's resting on
your shoulders, doesn't it?

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0030
rows.name:
It's not, though. Remember, you're
not the only one fighting to protect
this country.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0031
rows.name:
We're a strange gaggle of misfits,
I admit, but we'll carry that burden
with you.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0032
rows.name:
Iira lives and dies by its people. We
fight for it together, every one of us.

rows.label: fev11_670_150_msg0033
rows.name:
Right... Give me a moment. I know
there's not much time but I'll...
I'll see what I can do...
